title: U.S. household expenditure on slipcovers and decorative pillows 2007 to 2018
yAxis: Average annual expenditure in U.S. dollars
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Average annual expenditure in U.S. dollars. In total the number of data points it has is 12.
In general Average annual expenditure in U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2013 and 2014.
The highest Average annual expenditure in U.S. dollars, of value 5.01 was reached at Year 2018
Minimum Average annual expenditure in U.S. dollars about 2.93 was reached at Year 2008
min_summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Average annual expenditure in U.S. dollars. In total the number of data points it has is 12.
In general Average annual expenditure in U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.

Average annual expenditure in U.S. dollars is roughly increasing from 2007 to 2009, roughly constant from 2009 to 2011, slightly decreasing from 2011 to 2013, rapidly increasing from 2013 to 2014, roughly constant from 2014 to 2015, and finally slightly increasing from 2015 to 2018.

Overall Average annual expenditure in U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
